OpenGL operations. If you are using features like fixed-function sphere
mapping, it is best to leave this to yup-right. However, if you are
creating a shader-only application, it may be easier and more efficient
to set this to default. gl-cube-map-seamless bool 1 This configures Panda to try and enable seamless cube map sampling
when supported. This will help to remove seams that show up at cube map
edges, especially at lower resolutions. On by default; disable if you
suspect that this is causing problems or if you simply don't need the
